info.title: Study Spot Reviews API
info.description:
A comprehensive API for managing study spots, cafes, user reviews, and user management.
    
    ## Features
    
    * **User Management**: Create, read, update, and delete users with simple authentication
    * **Cafe Management**: Create, read, update, and delete cafe information
    * **Review System**: Submit and manage reviews for study spots
    * **Bookmark System**: Save and manage favorite cafes for users
    * **Photo Uploads**: Attach photos to reviews and upload profile pictures
    * **Search & Discovery**: Find cafes by location, amenities, and ratings
    * **Geospatial Queries**: Find nearby cafes based on coordinates
    * **File Management**: Upload, delete, and manage files in cloud storage
    * **Simple Login**: Plain text authentication system for users
    
    ## Getting Started
    
    1. Use the `/api/v1/users/` endpoints to manage user accounts and authentication
    2. Use the `/api/v1/cafes/` endpoints to manage cafe information
    3. Use the `/api/v1/reviews/` endpoints to manage reviews
    4. Use the `/api/v1/bookmarks/` endpoints to manage user bookmarks
    5. Use the `/api/v1/files/` endpoints to upload and manage files
    6. All endpoints return JSON responses
    
    ## User System
    
    The user system includes:
    - **User CRUD Operations**: Create, read, update, and delete users
    - **Simple Login**: Plain text password authentication
    - **Profile Pictures**: Upload and manage user profile pictures
    - **User Statistics**: Track cafes visited and average ratings

post.description: Create a new user with username, cafes visited count, average rating, and password.

get.description: Retrieve a list of all users with pagination support.

parameters.name: skip

schema.description: Number of users to skip
schema.title: Skip

parameters.description: Number of users to skip

parameters.name: limit

schema.description: Maximum number of users to return
schema.title: Limit

parameters.description: Maximum number of users to return

200.description: A list of user objects (passwords excluded).

schema.title: Response Get All Users Api V1 Users  Get

get.summary: Get a specific user by ID
get.description: Retrieve a specific user by their unique MongoDB ObjectId.

put.description: Update user information. Allows partial updates - only provided fields will be updated.

delete.description: Delete a user by their unique ID. This action also removes their profile picture if it exists.

post.description: Upload a profile picture for a specific user. Replaces existing profile picture if one exists.

get.description: Search for users by username using a text query (case-insensitive).

parameters.name: query

schema.description: Text to search in usernames
schema.title: Query

parameters.description: Text to search in usernames

schema.title: Response Search Users Api V1 Users Search  Get

post.description: Authenticate a user with username and password (plain text).

Create a new review for a study spot.
    
    This endpoint allows users to submit reviews for study spots with ratings for:
    - Overall experience (0-5 scale)
    - Outlet accessibility (0-5 scale)
    - WiFi quality (0-5 scale)
    - Optional text descriptions for atmosphere, energy level, and study-friendliness

get.description: Retrieve a single review by its unique ID, providing detailed information about the review, including ratings and user comments.

parameters.name: review_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the review to retrieve
schema.title: Review Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the review to retrieve

put.description: Update an existing review by its ID. This allows for partial updates, so you only need to provide the fields you want to change.

parameters.name: review_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the review to update
schema.title: Review Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the review to update

delete.description: Delete a review by its unique ID. This action is irreversible.

parameters.name: review_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the review to delete
schema.title: Review Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the review to delete

get.summary: Get reviews for a study spot
get.description: Retrieve all reviews for a specific study spot, identified by its ID. This is useful for displaying all user feedback for a particular location.

parameters.name: study_spot_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the study spot to get reviews for
schema.title: Study Spot Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the study spot to get reviews for

200.description: Successfully retrieved list of reviews for the study spot

schema.title: Response Get Reviews By Study Spot Api V1 Reviews By Spot  Study Spot Id  Get

post.summary: Add a photo to a review
post.description: Attach a new photo to a specific review. The photo details (URL and caption) should be provided in the request body.

parameters.name: review_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the review to add a photo to
schema.title: Review Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the review to add a photo to

post.summary: Upload and add a photo to a review
post.description: Upload a photo file directly to DigitalOcean Spaces and attach it to a specific review.

parameters.name: review_id

schema.description: The unique ID of the review to add a photo to
schema.title: Review Id

parameters.description: The unique ID of the review to add a photo to

400.description: Invalid file or review not found

500.description: Failed to upload photo or add to review
